__TOC__

As Nik Butler has announced that he is stepping down, the position of LoCo contact will shortly become vacant. If you are interested in the job, the process of applying is described below. This process has been designed to be democratically fair, so please stick to it. Late entries will not be accepted.

Candidates for the Loco contact position have until 23:59 on Wednesday 26th September 2007 to register an interest by adding their names to the following page.

https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UKTeam/ubuntu-uk.org/PoC_candidates

Names will then be taken from the candidate page, and added to a Launchpad poll which will appear here:

https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-uk/+polls

The poll will be open for voting by <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-uk/+members|Ubuntu-UK]]</nowiki> members registered with the <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/|Launchpad]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-uk|Ubuntu-UK]]</nowiki> team from 0:00 Thursday 28th September 2007 until 21:00 Sunday 30th September 2007.

At or around the close of voting, the winning candidate will be announced on the mailing list, forums and IRC.

NOTE: All times quoted are BST, not UTC.
